definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: The correlation coefficient between the rates of error and the team ranking is negative.
sentences.chinese: 失误率与名次的相关系数均为负值。

sentences.english: Or even go to negative values.
So let's look at a case where it's actually going to be negative.
sentences.chinese: 那么让我们来看一个它是负值的例子。

sentences.english: Negative values move the object in the direction of the negative axis.
sentences.chinese: 负值则表示向负轴方向移动对象。

sentences.english: While what flows right to left is counted negatively.
sentences.chinese: 从右流向左的，当作负值来算。

sentences.english: Well we know stock prices are never negative.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道股价是不会是负值的。

sentences.english: And, because I looked at the website, I know this reaction has a negative number.
sentences.chinese: 因为我看过网站，我知道这个反应是一个负值。

sentences.english: Performs a unary operation that returns the negative value of a numeric expression.
sentences.chinese: 执行一元运算，返回数值表达式的负值。

definition: real-valued (math.)/taking real numbers as values (of a function)
